info.name: Solarized Dark: Python website
info.description: Makes the Python website use the Solarized color palette. Note that this will only work on www.python.org, not on python.org or any of the other subdomains.
info.additionalInfo: This style was originally designed for the old Python website, but it appears to work quite well with the new website as well. I have made some adjustments to make it work better with the new Python website.
